annotations.description: Today's game was very poor. There weren't many thrilling moments. Barcelona had more of the game and were superior. Their manager will certainly be the happier of the two managers. The hosts tried to catch the opposition off guard and hit them on the break. The visiting side kept the ball at their feet and the main intention was to produce that final killer pass.

annotations.label: whistle

Diego Godin (Atl. Madrid) does his best to latch onto a cross into the box, but he can't get to the ball.
A pass from Luis Suarez (Barcelona) is intercepted by Jan Oblak and the move breaks down.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 additional min. will be played.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) lines up the resulting free kick from the edge of the box, but he produces a poor shot that goes high over the bar. The ball could have snow on it when it returns!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The foul by Jose Maria Gimenez (Atl. Madrid) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Neymar (Barcelona) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger. Barcelona have a corner.
Neymar races towards the box before laying off to Lionel Messi (Barcelona), who picks it up but blazes a shot well over the bar from the edge of the box.
Yannick Carrasco (Atl. Madrid) sprays a pass out to Luciano Vietto, but he can't beat his man inside the box.
A nice lofted cross finds Jackson Martinez (Atl. Madrid) unmarked. He takes an excellent touch and gets in a shot that goes towards the middle of the net. An easy save for the goalkeeper, though.

Jan Oblak pulls off a great save to deny Luis Suarez (Barcelona), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom left corner. Barcelona force a corner. They send men into the box.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's 1:2! Luis Suarez feeds Lionel Messi (Barcelona) inside the box, who is unmarked and buries the ball in the bottom right corner.
That's a well taken pass by Tiago (Atl. Madrid). He unleashes a strike from the edge of the box, but blazes it high over the bar.

Good defending. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) tries to find Neymar inside the box, but the pass is cut out.

Jan Oblak doesn't have to worry about this one. Rafinha plays a pass into the feet of Luis Suarez (Barcelona), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes well wide of the right post.

annotations.description: Neymar (Barcelona) takes a wonderful free kick and curls the ball into the top left corner with an absolutely phenomenal strike!

annotations.description: Tiago plays a neat ball into the path of Fernando Torres (Atl. Madrid), who makes room for a shot and sends in a low drive which bounces in off the left post! 1:0.

The Barcelona players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

Well, it hasn't been the most exciting game in the world but there has been some nice football on display. We hope that the second period will bring more action. Barcelona have arguably been the better of the two sides in the first half. The home team's main weapon is fast counter attacks, while the away side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.

annotations.label: whistle

annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

Jan Oblak pulls off a great save to deny Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) after receiving a precise defence splitting pass. The effort is headed for the top right corner, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop it. Definitely the best save of this match so far! The linesman makes the right call and Barcelona will have a corner.
Gabi (Atl. Madrid) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Antonio Mateu Lahoz saw the whole situation. Barcelona get a free kick.
The ball is cleared after Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Koke (Atl. Madrid).
Fernando Torres (Atl. Madrid) forces a pass into the box, but Marc Andre ter Stegen is alert and does a great job to rob him of the ball.
Juanfran (Atl. Madrid) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Antonio Mateu Lahoz stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning.

Hello, welcome to our live play by play commentaries. You will be able to see a written form of all the interesting moments of the game, so you won't miss a thing. Sit back and have fun.
Here is Barcelona's form from their latest matches: Espanyol (5:0), Betis (2:0), Gijon (6:0), Dep. La Coruna (8:0).
Atl. Madrid have completed the new signings: Filipe Luis (Chelsea), Stefan Savic (Fiorentina).

Today's game was very poor. There weren't many thrilling moments. Barcelona had more of the game and were superior. Their manager will certainly be the happier of the two managers. The hosts tried to catch the opposition off guard and hit them on the break. The visiting side kept the ball at their feet and the main intention was to produce that final killer pass.
